description: I know bullshit when I see it.

subs.text: I don't care how it became 6-3 in favor of the fascists, that's where it is now, that's not the United States, and that's not the Constitution.
It's bullshit. I don't care if the Dems don't have the votes to fix it. It's still bullshit.
Bullshit is bullshit. Pretty simple folks.
